result.eng: I was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.
result.ga: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontach
result.orig: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontach
result.html: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontachI was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé sa ḃeár le cúpla cara agus ḃí an ċraic go hiontaċI was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.

result.eng: Which of my friends will get an invitation?
result.ga: Cé acu de mo chairde a gheobhaidh cuireadh
result.orig: Cé acu de mo chairde a gheobhaidh cuireadh
result.html: Cé acu de mo chairde a gheobhaidh cuireadhWhich of my friends will get an invitation?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu de mo ċairde a ġeoḃaiḋ cuireaḋWhich of my friends will get an invitation?

result.html: Is dlúthchairde muidWe are close friends.
result.ponchtml: Is dlúṫċairde muidWe are close friends.

result.html: I gcuideachta cairdeIn the company of friends.
result.ponchtml: I gcuideaċta cairdeIn the company of friends.

result.html: Is cairde muidWe are friends.
result.ponchtml: Is cairde muidWe are friends.

result.eng: These aren't friends, they're false friends.
result.ga: Ní cairde iad seo ach bréagchairde
result.orig: Ní cairde iad seo ach bréagchairde
result.html: Ní cairde iad seo ach bréagchairdeThese aren't friends, they're false friends.
result.ponchtml: Ní cairde iad seo aċ bréagċairdeThese aren't friends, they're false friends.

result.eng: That's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ga: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.orig: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.html: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ponchtml: Sin deireaḋ leis an scéal a ċairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.

result.ga: Tá fáilte romhaibh go hÉirinn a chairde
result.orig: Tá fáilte romhaibh go hÉirinn a chairde
result.html: Tá fáilte romhaibh go hÉirinn a chairdeWelcome to Ireland, friends!
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roṁaiḃ go hÉirinn a ċairdeWelcome to Ireland, friends!

result.eng: My brother and I are great friends.
result.ga: Tá mo dheartháir agus mise an-mhór le chéile
result.orig: Tá mo dheartháir agus mise an-mhór le chéile
result.html: Tá mo dheartháir agus mise an-mhór le chéileMy brother and I are great friends.
result.ponchtml: Tá mo ḋearṫáir agus mise an-ṁór le ċéileMy brother and I are great friends.

result.eng: I speak to my friends at midday.
result.ga: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán lae
result.orig: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán lae
result.html: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán laeI speak to my friends at midday.
result.ponchtml: Laḃraím le mo ċairde ag meán laeI speak to my friends at midday.

result.ga: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaí
result.orig: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaí
result.html: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaíYour friends are drinking pints.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḃur gcairde ag ól piontaíYour friends are drinking pints.

result.eng: I met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ga: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.orig: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.html: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ponchtml: Ċas mé le cúpla seanċara as Baile na hAḃann nuair a ḃí mé ṫallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.

result.eng: Did you meet with a few old friends?
result.ga: Ar chas tú le cúpla seanchara
result.orig: Ar chas tú le cúpla seanchara
result.html: Ar chas tú le cúpla seancharaDid you meet with a few old friends?
result.ponchtml: Ar ċas tú le cúpla seanċaraDid you meet with a few old friends?

result.html: Tagaigí isteach a chairdeCome on in, friends.
result.ponchtml: Tagaigí isteaċ a ċairdeCome on in, friends.

result.ga: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairde

result.html: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairdeI'll be meeting some friends.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé ag bualaḋ le roinnt cairdeI'll be meeting some friends.

result.eng: Sometimes I have dinner in a restaurant with my friends.

result.eng: He was his school friends' laughing stock.
result.ga: Bhí sé ina cheap magaidh ag a chomhscoláirí
